summary.span: Provides the capability to group controls together.

span.span: Provides the capability to group controls together.

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表单代表 ASP.NET 移动 Web 页中的控件的最外层分组。A form represents the outermost grouping of controls within an ASP.NET mobile Web page. 单个移动 Web 页面可以包含最外层的多个窗体。An individual mobile Web page can contain multiple forms at the outermost level. 不能嵌套窗体;使用控制如果你想要嵌套容器。Forms cannot be nested; use controls if you want to nest containers. 有关详细信息，请参阅[窗体控件简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a1946a-bb3c-41c8-90cd-f00643525016)。For more information, see [Introduction to the Form Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a1946a-bb3c-41c8-90cd-f00643525016). 若要显示特定形式，请设置对当前的属性页上向所需的窗体，或设置中的属性控件添加到所需的形式。To display a specific form, either set the property on the current page to the desired form, or set the property in a control to the desired form. 可以包含文字文本以及其伴随的标记的文本内容在控件。You can include literal text along with its accompanying markup tags in the text contents of the control. 使用模板时，务必要记住控件创建模板中的实例窗体的方法。When using templates, it is important to remember that the control creates instances of templates in the method for the form. 窗体的方法之前调用`Page_Load`和`Page_Init`。The method for the form is called before `Page_Load` and `Page_Init`. 此外，页构造函数执行得太早在中设置模板方法因为尚未创建窗体。Also, the page constructor executes too early to set templates in the method because the form is not yet created. 若要纠正此问题，挂钩窗体的自身方法，并创建模板存在的一个实例。To correct this, hook the form's own method, and create an instance of the template there. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现模板化呈现](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922)。For more information, see [Implementing Templated Rendering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b86d9d1d-ab18-4cad-a825-092826bb3922). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个有两种形式之间的两种形式的链接以及网页。The following code example shows how to create a page with two forms along with links between the two forms. 一种形式具有复选框列表。One form has a check box list. 当选择项和**提交**单击按钮时，窗体将显示所选的项目及其值的一个列表。When items are selected and the **Submit** button is clicked, the form presents a list of the selected items and their values. 请注意，事件方法准备显示各自的窗体Notice that the event methods prepare the respective forms for display > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值、 空字符串 ("")，导致回发到包含当前窗体的页面。The default value, an empty string (""), causes postbacks to the page containing the current form. 你可以重写要提交到另一个 URL 窗体的默认值。You can override the default value to submit the form to a different URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果继承属性，控件发到继承的 URL 的表单内容。If the property is inherited, the control posts form contents to the inherited URL.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生下列情况下：The event occurs under the following circumstances: - 当第一次请求页时，将激活第一种形式。When a page is first requested, the first form is activated. - 当以编程方式设置页属性。When the property of the page is set programmatically. - 当用户导航到窗体通过其目标是一种形式的控制。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 此事件的事件链中的位置，使得用于绑定到数据源的子控件或设置窗体属性由继承的所有子控件非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important for binding child controls to data sources or for setting a form property that can be inherited by all child controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置`OnActivate`属性中元素指向时执行的方法事件发生。The following code example shows how to set the `OnActivate` attribute in the element to point to a method that executes when the event occurs. `Form2_Activate`方法准备要显示的第二种形式。The `Form2_Activate` method prepares the second form for display. 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#8)]

value.span: 在可以分页的窗体控件。

span.span: The control on the form that can be paginated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于允许单个控件在窗体，以将其内容分为个移动设备和提供下一步和上一个视图之间的导航上的多个视图上。The property is used to allow a single control on a form to paginate its contents across several views on mobile devices and providing next and previous navigation between views. 控件可以分页其内容，即使包含控件具有其属性设置为`false`。A control can paginate its contents even if a containing control has its property set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性类，以指定哪个控件进行分页。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the class to specify which control to paginate. 此示例创建具有两个窗体页。The example creates a page with two forms. 一种形式具有一个很长的字符串，在某些设备上必须分页才能提供用户访问权限的整个文本。One form has a very long string that on some devices must be paginated to give the user access to the entire text. 若要查看在操作中的分页，您必须处理分页的设备上查看该示例。In order to see the pagination in action, you must view the example on a device that handles pagination. 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，你可以使用适用于设备仿真程序之一**设备仿真程序管理器**上**工具**菜单。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can use one of the device emulators available with the **Device Emulator Manager** on the **Tools** menu. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileFormSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体变为非活动状态在下列情况下：A form becomes inactive under the following circumstances: - 当页属性以编程方式设置为另一种形式。When the property of the page is programmatically set to another form. - 当用户导航到窗体通过其目标是一种形式的控制。When the user navigates to a form through a control whose target is a form. 如果发生这些操作任一种情况，活动窗体从不会收到事件。If neither of these actions occurs, the active form will never receive a event. 此事件的事件链中的位置，使得在重置子控件、 数据集或全局变量非常重要。This event's position in the event chain makes it very important in resetting the child controls, data set, or global variables. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何捕获事件以清除。The following code example demonstrates how to trap the event to clear the . 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. returns.span: A set of forms that are linked to the current form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗体包含激活另一种形式，无需与服务器交互的导航元素时，它被视为可链接的窗体。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interacting with the server, it is considered to be a linked form. 有几个因素窗体视为参与链接。There are several factors involved for a form to be considered linked. 例如，如果满足以下三个条件，窗体 B 被视为可链接到窗体答： 形式之一For example, if the following three stipulations are met, Form B is considered to be one of the forms linked to Form A: - 窗体包含具有其目标为 B 窗体控件Form A contains a control with its destination as Form B. - 窗体的不包含事件处理程序。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 窗体 B 未包含任何事件处理程序。Form B has no event handler. 它们的区别是不需要服务器交互传输之间的控制的所有窗体的集合。The distinction is the set of all forms that do not require server interactions to transfer control between.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`get`请求是它可以发送的数据量的限制。A `get` request is limited in the amount of data it can post. 使用时，可能会失败某些类型的回发`get`请求。Some types of postbacks might fail when using a `get` request. 利用`get`请求是可以缓存的 URL 和 URL 的一部分，或者将其保存，指定所有参数。The advantage of a `get` request is that all the parameters are specified as part of the URL, and the URL can be cached or saved. 元素`post`请求都包含在。The elements of a `post` request are contained within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此方法通知，请服务器控件必须执行任何所需创建并设置实例的初始化步骤。When notified by this method, server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在此阶段的服务器控件的生命周期中，控件的视图状态尚未填充。In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，当调用此方法是，无论是否的子级或父级到该控件不能访问其他服务器控件。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called either, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 其他服务器控件也不一定能够将创建并可供访问。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

exception.span: The form is contained by another form.

span.span: The form is contained by another form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件公开属性和属性，用于提供有关如何分页当前窗体的信息。The control exposes the property and the property, which provide information about how the current form is paginated. 属性还有助于提供到其他页导航功能。The property also helps provide navigation capability to another page. 例如，在更丰富的设备上进行呈现时, 搜索结果窗体可能包括允许用户浏览到按数而不是链接导航的结果页的特定于设备的 UI 元素。For example, when rendering on a richer device, a search results form might include device-specific UI elements that allow the user to browse to a page of results by number rather than by link navigation. > [!NOTE] > 此值是之后可用已发生事件。This value is available after the event has occurred. 若要获取属性，你可以处理窗体的事件。To get the property, you can handle the event of the form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the control. 此代码示例是一个更大的示例的一部分属性。This code example is part of a larger example for the property. [!code-csharp[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/cs/Default2.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[MobileFormSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileFormSample/vb/Default2.aspx#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以编程方式设置此属性，它不会为每个请求中保持。If this property is set programmatically, it is not persisted for each request. 如果以声明方式设置该属性，该属性保留为每个请求。If the property is set declaratively, the property is persisted for each request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自为更大的示例属性。This code example is from a larger example for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体进行分页呈现每个请求之前。A form is paginated prior to rendering each request. 分页完成后，事件发生。After pagination is complete, the event occurs. 此事件发生后，窗体的属性包含的窗体页的实际数目。After this event occurs, the property of the form contains the actual number of pages for the form. ## Examples 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅示例属性。For a complete code example, see the example for the property.

value.span: 可以将标题呈现窗体上，在支持独立于 （例如，在浏览器使用 HTML 中的标题标签的标题栏） 的页面内容的标题的设备上的一部分。

span.span: The title can be rendered as part of the form, on devices that support a title separate from page content (for example, on the title bar of a browser using the title tag in HTML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于支持独立于页面内容的标题的设备，你可以呈现为窗体部分的标题。For devices that support a title separate from the page content, you can render the title as part of the form.
